alert.note: Alert for Polk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued March 05 at 3:15AM CST until March 05 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Ice Storm Warning, significant icing. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Polk County. * WHEN...For the Ice Storm Warning, until noon CST today. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 3 PM this afternoon to 3 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
